page.title: 17RELIGION
page.content:
RELIGION In our area there are 6 churches. Three of them are Church of England, one is a Methodist and there is a Roman Catholic one and a United Reformed one. Also in our area there is a Franciscan Monastery and a Roman Catholic Seminary.
ST.JOHN'S SEMINARY St.John's Seminary was built in 1891. At the moment the Seminary has 6o pupils.The pupils come mainly from London, Kent, Sussex, Surrey, Dorset, Devon and Yorkshire. The course they take lasts five years but they only study at the Seminary for four years, for the last year they train in a parish. St.John's Seminary has 6o acres of land, some of it used for grazing.
